Get Web Hosting with GetWebHosting (From £2.99/mo in France, UK, Germany, Finland!)

finland, france, germany, getwebhosting, uk October 25, 2020 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Get Web Hosting returns after their May appearance on LEB, which got generally positive comments from the community.  They’re up-front about being new with this brand (11 months), which is a lower-cost alternative to their Powerful Box brand.

This time they’re offering VPS service in France, Germany, Finland, and the UK.  You’ll be running on Ryzen node with NVMe SSD.  Service comes with unlimited traffic at higher tiers, on a 1gbps port with 100Mbps guaranteed, which is a nice touch.  These VPSes are pretty feature packed: Windows Server licenses, snapshot backups, IPv6, and DDOS protection, all wrapped up in a documented SLA.

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their Terms of Service, privacy policy, and SLA on their web site.  You can pay with PayPal, Credit Cards, and Bitcoin.

If you decide to get web hosting from Get Web Hosting, please comment below and let the community know how it goes!

Here’s what they had to say about their company, in their own words:

“Get Web Hosting offer reliable and affordable unmanaged and managed SSD VPS hosting, Resellers and shared hosting in London, UK. Our Get Web Hosting brand has only been around for 11 months; however, it was created as low-cost alternative to Powerful Box which we have been running for the pass 5 years. Customers use us due our competitive pricing on the UK market and the fact we only use SSD NVMe Datacenter class local storage, plus achieved over 200 days of uptime on our VPS nodes. Our VPS services also come with Windows Server Licenses, Snapshot backups, Anti DDoS and IPv6 included for free. Plus, we have a comprehensive SLA (service level agreement) that refunds clients if we fall short of it.“

Read on to see the offer and learn more!
